meaningMnemonic: The <radical>Mona Lisa</radical> is in front of you. "You must all paint the Mona Lisa <kanji>concurrently</kanji>," says your art class teacher.
readingMnemonic: Your entire class finishes <kanji>concurrently</kanji>. You look at your finished result. Wait, that's not the Mona Lisa. You painted <reading>Ken</reading> (けん) the samurai.
